name: Space Ranger
description:
You are a Space Ranger!
Your mission: Keep your planet alive and safe from the spacial threats!

With the Astronaut, round the orbit of the planet and use the Attraction Gun to get the Stars of Life to full restore your planet's life.  When things get ugly, take control of the Guardian Cannons to destroy Deadly Meteors.

CONTROLS:
Mouse cursor to aim.
Hold left click for weapon activation.
Right click for weapon swapping.

CREDITS:
This is a collaborative piece of work, we all contributed with the Game Design.

Arthur Graciano - Code
JanaChumi -  Art
Jessica Azambuja - Art 
Luciana do Prado - Game Design
Luísa Cecília - Production
